channel.title: Canadian Border Patrol
channel.description: Totally fake border agency, real strange Canadian culture
channel.itunes:subtitle: Totally fake border agency, real strange Canadian culture
channel.itunes:summary: Ryan is Canadian. Jordan is American. Together, they investigate strange and interesting bits of Canadian culture.
channel.itunes:author: Jordan Rhea; Ryan Oldford

item.title: Canadian 90s Playlist (Part 1)
item.description:
Jordan and Ryan investigate Spotify’s Canadian 90s playlist, and go deep in the grunge mines.

Moment of Canadianness: Refugee children enjoying snow for 1st time(tinyurl.com/ya3ogc5l)

Check out Spotify’s Canadian ’90s playlist(tinyurl.com/y2lhtjnq)

Band facts:

  • Details about Great Big Sea’s cover of “End of the World” taken from the Wikipedia article about the original song. (tinyurl.com/yyvb3qre)
  • Other band facts sourced from the Wikipedia articles for each group. (You know how to get them.)

Check out Punch Up The Jam at punchupthejam.com/ !

Thanks to The Motorleague(www.themotorleague.ca/) for our theme song “North America”!

item.title: Heritage Minutes (Part 2)
item.description:
Jordan and Ryan continue investigating the Heritage Minute PSAs, and Jordan discovers the true nature of Canadian history.

I built my Heritage Minute Playlist(tinyurl.com/y4qm7nov) using these articles by Justin McElroy (not the one from www.themcelroy.family/)

  • The 10 Best Canadian Heritage Minutes of All Time(tinyurl.com/y5vmtzyv)
  • Ranking Every Canadian Heritage Minute: #25-11(tinyurl.com/y5wjvjvw)

Thanks to The Motorleague(www.themotorleague.ca/) for our theme song “North America”!

item.title: Heritage Minutes (Part 1)
